#summary Summary of software this project depends on
#labels Phase-Requirements

= Requirements =

To use the python sources you need to have the following libraries installed
  * [http://python.org/ Python 2.5]
  * [http://pyserial.sourceforge.net/ pySerial]
    * Python 2.2 or newer
    * win32all extensions on Windows

= other code used =

  * [http://lucumr.pocoo.org/articles/simple-templates-in-python stpy for export templates]
  * [http://www.py2exe.org/ py2exe for exe-builds]
